name: Mark
title: Looks Great!
message: Good job creating this little site in the past few weeks, dude.

name: Bob
title: Could Be Better, I think...
message: I've noticed a few glitches around the site, but I understand there was a time crunch!

name: Frank
title: Business Opportunity
message: The guys at my consulting agency are really interesting in getting in contact with you, please keep in touch. You have my e-mail.

name: Jane
title: Critique: More Memes
message: Very professional, but kind of boring honestly. Have a little fun! Have you considered Chuck Norris? Funniest stuff I've ever seen.
